    grid-auto-flow: column;
    grid-gap: 10px;
    }

    color: white;
    font-size: 10px;
    padding: 10px;

    margin: 0;

    border-radius: 400px;
    }

    grid-row: span 12;
    }
  .circle:nth-child(2), 
  .circle:nth-child(3) {
    grid-row: span 6;
    }
</style>
